QuestData.Title: In Strict Confidence
QuestData.Description: If anyone knows where the admiral is, then surely it must be his captains on the ships in Onslaught Harbor.$B$B<The lord-commander rubs his hands together.>$B$BWelsington and Hartford are their names if memory serves. Go beat the information out of them and then end their miserable lives.$B$BI want to know where the grand admiral is hidden!
QuestData.LogDescription: Lord-Commander Arete at Death's Rise wants you to beat information out of Captains Welsington and Hartford.
QuestData.RewardText: They resurrected Landgren? He's the one that will know where the grand admiral is then!

Objectives.Objective: Captain Welsington beaten for information and killed
Captain Hartford beaten for information and killed
